'''Healing''' may refer to:

== ''Minecraft'' ==
* [[File:Heart.svg|link=Healing|16px]] [[Healing]], the act of regaining health.
* {{EffectLink|Instant Health}}, a status effect that heals the player.
* {{ItemLink|Potion of Healing}}, a beneficial potion.
* {{ItemLink|Splash Potion of Healing}}, a beneficial throwable potion.
* {{ItemLink|Lingering Potion of Healing}}, a beneficial throwable potion that leaves effect cloud.
* {{ItemLink|Arrow of Healing}}, a beneficial arrow.
* {{EntitySprite|Zombie Villager}} The process of [[Tutorial:Curing a zombie villager|curing]] a zombie villager.
* {{EffectLink|Regeneration}}, another status effect that regenerates health.

== ''Minecraft Dungeons'' ==
* {{DuItemLink|Health Potion}}
